mapper.select: SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price, is_sales, description FROM mst_product WHERE is_delete = 0;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price, is_sales, description FROM mst_product WHERE is_sales = #{isSales} AND is_delete = 0;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mst_product (product_name, product_price, is_sales, is_delete, description) VALUES (#{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{isSales}, #{isDelete}, #{description});
mapper.delete: UPDATE mst_product SET is_delete = 1 WHERE product_id = #{productId};
